org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor

类 JobLeaderService.JobManagerLeaderListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor.JobLeaderService.JobManagerLeaderListener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LeaderRetrievalListener
    封闭类:
    JobLeaderService

    private final class JobLeaderService.JobManagerLeaderListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements LeaderRetrievalListener
    Leader listener which tries to establish a connection to a newly detected job leader.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Rpc connection for the job manager <--> task manager connection.

      • stop

        public void stop()

      • notifyLeaderAddress

        public void notifyLeaderAddress(java.lang.String leaderAddress,
                                java.util.UUID leaderId)
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderRetrievalListener
        This method is called by the LeaderRetrievalService when a new leader is elected.
        指定者:
        notifyLeaderAddress 在接口中 LeaderRetrievalListener
        参数:
        leaderAddress - The address of the new leader
        leaderId - The new leader session ID

      • handleError

        public void handleError(java.lang.Exception exception)
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderRetrievalListener
        This method is called by the LeaderRetrievalService in case of an exception. This assures that the LeaderRetrievalListener is aware of any problems occurring in the LeaderRetrievalService thread.
        指定者:
        handleError 在接口中 LeaderRetrievalListener
